changelog:
- Hostage prompts now display to proper quality with translations
- Hostage glow no longer disappears after repeated Instinct use
- Updates to latest AOM files, includes Bruce Lee voice
- NPCs can now see through warehouse windows
- A forklift at the dock is now functional
- Forklift distraction zones now work as intended
- Five more body dumping containers have been added
- Master mode guards no longer spawn in wrong place
- Baseball bat can now be picked up, crowbar next to it moved to somewhere else
- Opens window to warehouse bathroom and improves that area
- Cameras will no longer be 'destroyed' at beginning of Professional mode playthrough
- Adds plain map from Freelancer Variations
- Fixes for SMF3 Beta
